### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE game_inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE game_inventory SET quantity = 5 WHERE id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE game_inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,

)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE game_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1, price = price * 0.9 WHERE item_type = 'consumable';
